comment._content: Emanuel Lorenz Philipp (1861-1925), Milwaukee Police Commissioner 1909-14; Governor of Wisconsin, 1915-21 (first elected 1914). en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emanuel_Lorenz_Philipp

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Kestenbaum: Thanks for pointing us to Philipp's full name and biographical information.  We'll include this information next time we update the description.
